donor_name: SWISS AGENCY FOR DEVELOPMENT AND COOPERATION - SDC
outputs.output_descr: The project will assist with building capacity for the implementation of the APRM through providing technical and financial support to the Panel and secretariat; provide support to APRM countries in undertaking preparations for APRM, to operational activities of the APR Panel and Secretariat including background studies, country visits as well as to advocacy and awareness building for APRM.

project_descr: Support to the Africa Peer Review Mechanism (APRM) Trust Fund
project_title: Assistance to the African Peer Review Mechanism
